00033 void setup()
00034 {
00035     /* Setup serial interface */
00036     Serial.begin( 115200 );
00037     Serial.println( "Adafruit BMP180 Pressure Sensor Test" );
00038 
00039 
00040     /* Setup Adafruit BMP180 sensor */
00041     Serial.print( "Init sensor BMP180......................" );
00042     if( sensor.init() != Adafruit_BMP180::NoError ) {
00043         Serial.println( "[FAILED]" );
00044         while( 1 );
00045     } else {
00046         Serial.println( "[  OK  ]" );
00047     }
00048 
00049 }

00054 void loop()
00055 {
00056     /* Print Start Of Frame */
00057     Serial.print( "$test_Adafruit_BMP180;" );
00058 
00059 
00060     /* Print raw temperature */
00061     Serial.print( sensor.readRawTemperature() );
00062     Serial.print( ";" );
00063 
00064 
00065     /* Print Celsius temperature */
00066     Serial.print( sensor.getTemperature_c() );
00067     Serial.print( ";" );
00068 
00069 
00070     /* Print raw pressure */
00071     Serial.print( sensor.readRawPressure() );
00072     Serial.print( ";" );
00073 
00074 
00075     /* Print Pascals pressure */
00076     Serial.print( sensor.getPressure_Pa() );
00077     Serial.print( ";" );
00078 
00079 
00080     /* Print Altitude */
00081     Serial.print( sensor.getAltitude_m() );
00082     Serial.print( ";" );
00083 
00084 
00085     /* Print End Of Frame */
00086     Serial.println( "*" );
00087 
00088     delay( 100 );
00089 }
